content:
Hi, I am Aqeel Anwar, a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at NVIDIA, where I work on advancing the perception systems that power autonomous vehicles. I hold a Ph.D. in ECE from Georgia Tech, where my research focused on building intelligent and efficient autonomous systems, particularly for resource-constrained environments.
Outside of engineering, I have a deep appreciation for architecture and design, especially skyscrapers. I enjoy building small-scale models and exploring urban spaces around the world.
I am also an avid traveler. Over the past decade, I have visited more than 20 countries and traveled extensively across the United States, gaining diverse cultural and professional experiences through international research, academic conferences, and personal exploration.
I occasionally write about machine learning, interview preparation, and my professional journey on Medium.
Current and Past Affiliations NVIDIA (Current) Samsung Research Georgia Tech (PhD) Semiconductor Research Corporation Fulbright UET (BSc)
summary: Hi, I am Aqeel Anwar, a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at NVIDIA, where I work on advancing the perception systems that power autonomous vehicles.
title: About Me

content:
Travel has always been a passion of mine ‚Äî a way to explore new cultures, challenge perspectives, and collect stories along the way. Over the years, I‚Äôve journeyed across 20+ countries, 25+ U.S. states, and 3 continents, each trip adding something unique to my worldview.
Below, you‚Äôll find an interactive map that traces my travels ‚Äî a visual glimpse into the places I‚Äôve explored. As much as I love the destinations themselves, I also enjoy reflecting on what made each one stand out. That‚Äôs what inspired my personal travel series: Around the World in Three Words
Take a scroll, explore the map.
üåç Countries I've Visited üá∫üá∏ States I've Visited # üåç Around the world in three words # In this series, I distill the essence of each place I‚Äôve visited into just three carefully chosen words ‚Äî whether it's the atmosphere, the people, the landscapes, or the feelings they left behind. It‚Äôs my minimalist take on storytelling, and I hope it offers a fun, quick, and personal perspective on my travels. Expand All üá≠üá∞ Hong Kong ‚Äî Contrasting, Vertical, Luxurious June 2025 Hong Kong is a city of contrasts, where ancient temples sit in the shadows of futuristic towers, and quiet fishing villages coexist with bustling financial districts, blending tradition with modernity at every turn. Its vertical nature is unmistakable, with a skyline that pierces the clouds‚Äîskyscrapers rising dramatically between emerald green mountains and a sparkling harbor, creating one of the most iconic urban landscapes in the world. Adding to its allure is Hong Kong‚Äôs luxurious side, evident in its grand malls adorned with high-end designer boutiques, gleaming sports cars weaving through the streets, and a distinct sense of refined elegance woven into the fabric of city life. Altogether, Hong Kong offers a mesmerizing fusion of the old and the new, the grounded and the grand.
üá∫üá∏ Florida - Tropical, Historical, Whimsical Apr 2024 Florida is renowned for being tropical, boasting a climate that beckons visitors with its warm breezes and lush landscapes, offering a haven for those seeking sun-kissed days and vibrant natural beauty, making it a beloved destination for travelers from around the globe. The state's rich historical tapestry adds depth to its allure, with sites like St. Augustine, the oldest continuously inhabited European-established settlement in the United States. From Spanish colonial architecture to Civil War battlefields, Florida's history comes alive, inviting visitors to explore its storied past and diverse cultural heritage. Moreover, Florida's charm extends to its whimsical side, epitomized by its world-class amusement parks and fantastical attractions. From the enchanting realms of Disney World to the cinematic magic of Universal Studios, these destinations ignite the imaginations of visitors of all ages, promising unforgettable adventures and moments of pure joy. üá∫üá∏ Michigan - Industrial, Scenic, Halal Nov 2023 Michigan hosts major players in the automotive industry, including General Motors, Ford Motors, and Stellantis. Detroit, renowned as the Motor City and the global auto capital, shares the spotlight with Kalamazoo, home to the global headquarters of medical technology giants Pfizer and Stryker. Battle Creek holds the title of the world's cereal capital. As the only bi-peninsula state in the U.S., Michigan features America's largest freshwater shoreline, with 90% of the Upper Peninsula cloaked in trees. Aptly nicknamed the Great Lake State, it is bordered by four of the five Great Lakes. Dearborn, Michigan, boasts the largest mosque in the U.S., and Detroit and other major cities offer abundant options for halal food. üáØüáµ Japan - Clean, Technologically-advanced, Heritage-rich Jul 2023 Japan, a captivating destination, seamlessly blends the charm of pristine cleanliness with its cutting-edge technological advancements, creating a truly remarkable experience. The streets gleam with impeccable tidiness, reflecting the Japanese commitment to maintaining a spotless environment. Beyond its cleanliness, Japan stands tall as a beacon of innovation, boasting a technologically advanced landscape that dazzles visitors from around the globe. From high-speed trains to futuristic robotics, Japan's technological prowess is nothing short of awe-inspiring. Amidst this modernity, Japan cherishes its rich heritage with a deep appreciation for its cultural traditions. Ancient customs, arts, and historical architecture thrive alongside the country's technological achievements. This perfect blend of cleanliness, technological innovation, and cultural heritage is what makes Japan an enchanting destination that leaves an indelible impression on all who have the pleasure of exploring its wonders. üá¨üá∑ Athens (Greece) - Mythical, Historic, Timeless Jun 2023 Nestled amidst Greece's sunny landscapes, Athens captivates with its ancient tales, timeless charm, and rich history. Its winding streets, adorned with famous ruins and marble landmarks, whisper stories of a bygone era and legendary figures. Exploring its historic sites unveils a tapestry of civilizations that flourished long ago, leaving an unforgettable imprint on the city's culture. But Athens is more than just its past. It goes beyond time, combining its lively atmosphere and vibrant cosmopolitan vibe with the echoes of centuries, creating a truly unique and timeless destination for everyone to enjoy. üá∫üá∏ New Orleans - Historic, Jazz-infused, Spirited May 2023 Situated along the beautiful Mississippi River, the city blends its rich history with vibrant jazz melodies and a lively atmosphere. Walking through its charming streets, you can't help but be captivated by the stunning historic architecture adorned with intricate details. The city's soul is deeply connected to its jazz heritage, with the melodic notes flowing from lively clubs, street corners, and festivals, mesmerizing both locals and visitors. From the exhilarating Mardi Gras celebrations to the energetic second-line parades, the city pulsates with an irresistible energy that leaves a lasting impression. In New Orleans, you'll be swept away by the perfect blend of its captivating history, soulful jazz rhythms, and a refreshing vibe that keeps the city vibrant and alive. üá∫üá∏ Seattle - Coffee, Geo-Metro-Fusion, Clean May 2022 Known as the Coffee Capital of the US due to its enduring coffee culture (and being the birthplace of Starbucks), Seattle boasts a stunning skyline against the backdrop of the Pacific Ocean and Mount Rainier, seamlessly blending artificial and natural beauty. Housing major Fortune 500 companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Alaska Airlines, Starbucks, and Nordstrom, the city showcases a wealth of modern architecture seen in landmarks such as the Space Needle, Museum of Pop Culture, Amazon Spheres, Rainier Square Tower, and The Great Wheel. Surprisingly cleaner than many other metropolises, possibly owing to its frequent rain, Seattle has earned a coveted spot on my list of the top five cities to live in. üá®üáø Prague - Timeless, Gothic, Enchanting Dec 2018 Prague feels timeless, a city where centuries seem to overlap in every cobblestone and cathedral. Home to the world‚Äôs oldest working astronomical clock, it invites you to pause and marvel at a city that has measured time for over 600 years, yet feels untouched by it. The city‚Äôs Gothic architecture looms majestically‚Äîsoaring spires, shadowy alleys, and medieval towers paint a dramatic skyline that whispers tales of kings, alchemists, and empires past. But beyond the history books, Prague is enchanting, with its labyrinth of bridges‚Äîmore than a hundred‚Äîgracefully spanning the Vltava River, especially magical at sunset when the city glows in hues of gold and rose. Together, Prague weaves history and fantasy into a living fairytale.
summary: Travel has always been a passion of mine ‚Äî a way to explore new cultures, challenge perspectives, and collect stories along the way.
title: Travel

content: Senior Machine Learning Engineer ‚Äî Autonomous Vehicles NVIDIA Corporation, Santa Clara, CA Jun 2021 - Present Working on improving perception DNN performance for autonomous vehicles using computer vision, machine learning and Generative AI based synthetic data generation. Responsibilities include generating synthetic data with Omniverse Replicator, leveraging realistic augmentations, developing multi-camera vision systems, and applying transfer learning to enhance perception. The work directly contributes to advancing safe and reliable autonomous driving. Graduate Research Assistant Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA Aug 2017 ‚Äì Jun 2021 Conducted research on enabling edge intelligence in resource-constrained autonomous systems, with a focus on reinforcement learning applications. Developed energy-efficient ML algorithms (e.g., domain randomization), proposed novel hardware-aware architectures, and addressed scalability challenges in multitask federated reinforcement learning systems. Work focused on drone navigation and on-device learning. Machine Learning System Intern Samsung Semiconductor Inc., San Jose, CA May 2019 ‚Äì August 2019 Worked in the Advanced Logic Lab on a novel STT-MRAM-based analog Processing-In-Memory (PIM) DNN accelerator. Developed an end-to-end simulation framework to optimize power-performance trade-offs for various DNN topologies. Achieved notable improvements in energy efficiency and latency over digital DNN accelerators. Machine Learning Engineer ‚Äî Autonomous Vehicles Aivsol, Germany (Remote) Jun 2017 ‚Äì Aug 2017 Developed deep learning models for object detection and classification in self-driving car applications using TensorFlow. Focused on pedestrian, vehicle, and traffic sign recognition. Adapted state-of-the-art algorithms, trained models, and provided recommendations for optimal deployment strategies.
